actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the tax credit for oil and gas extraction taxes paid to any foreign country.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny any credit to any taxpayer for any amount of any oil and gas extraction taxes paid or accrued to any foreign country.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the tax credit for oil and gas extraction taxes paid to any foreign country.
